isTextureRegionBufferManaged

setTextureRegionBufferManaged

public void setTextureRegionBufferManaged(boolean pTextureRegionBufferManaged)
Parameters:
pVertexBufferManaged - when passing true this BaseTextureRegion will make its TextureRegionBuffer unload itself from the active BufferObjectManager, when this BaseTextureRegion is finalized/garbage-collected.WARNING: When passing false one needs to take care of that by oneself!
